mapper.select: select a.poetry_id poetryId, a.title, a.content, a.image_url imageUrl, a.update_time updateTime, b.author_id authorId, b.author_name authorName from poetry a, author b where a.author_id = b.author_id limit ${size * (page - 1)}, #{size}
select count(*) from poetry a, author b where a.author_id = b.author_id
mapper.insert: insert into poetry (title, author_id, content, image_url, update_time) values (#{poetryName}, #{authorId}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, CURTIME())
